content: Advisor: A new title for the WhatsApp group could be beneficial in order to reflect the current focus of the group and its objectives. It may be helpful to gather suggestions from all group members and to select a title that accurately reflects the group's purpose and mission. Additionally, it might be useful to have a clear and concise title that is easy to understand, and that can attract more members to join the group, and also to make it easy for members to find the group when searching for it.
